metadata.title: CVE-2021-31294 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Redis before 6cbea7d allows a replica to cause an assertion failure in aprimary server by sending a non-administrative command (specifically, a SETcommand). NOTE: this was fixed for Redis 6.2.x and 7.x in 2021. Versionsbefore 6.2 were not intended to have safety guarantees related to this.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-31294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis - 5:7.0.15-1build2
redis-sentinel - 5:7.0.15-1build2
redis-server - 5:7.0.15-1build2
redis-tools - 5:7.0.15-1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5:7.0.15-1build2').
